question.text: The dissolution of <math><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></math> by a solution of <math><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></math> results in the formation of:

options.text: <math><msup><mrow><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>

<math><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><msup><mrow><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mo>–</mo></mrow></msup></math>

<math><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></math>

solution.text:
AlOH3 dissolve in NaOH solution to give AlOH4– ion which is supposed to have the octahedral complex species AlOH4H2O2– in aqueous solution

Al OH 3 +NaOH aq →  Al  OH 4 H 2 O 2 –   aq + Na + aq
